about_the_game:
"Epochal frameworks are no more. Around exists a world as people have grown accustomed to seeing it. At times, it oppresses, and at times, it permeates with a unique atmosphere. People live in this world, in the post-Soviet era.

In D.V. Ex Agent, a new compilation of music has emerged, blending the genre of Doomer Wave, which is a part of post-punk and a rock subgenre, along with atmospheric ambient composed by Illya Ivanov. Each track will immerse you in a unique atmosphere and introduce you to Doomer Wave."

Track List
1. Corridors Among Houses
2. Depths Of the Forest 90s
3. I Remember Evrything
4. the Main theme Is Infinity
5. Doomer Wave - Final theme
6. Doomer Wave - Home, Sweet Home
7. Doomer Wave - My Home
